## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G08305](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G08305)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>MEF37</u>
- **Gene Name:** Mitochondrial Editing Factor 37
- **Description:**   Pentatricopeptide repeat (PPR) superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_058773]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Impaired in Mitochondrial C to U Editing.
